name.baseName: Cultivation and comprehensive utilization of Litopenaeus vannamei ; Processed products of Litopenaeus vannamei ; Factory culture and comprehensive utilization
凡纳滨对虾养成及综合利用;凡纳滨对虾加工产品;工厂化养殖与综合利用

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the actual situation of the cultivation and comprehensive utilization of Penaeus vannamei, the processes directly related to the purpose and functional units of the study were considered, and the various stages of environmental load outside the plant were not considered. Data were collected for 2011 annual mean data. The functional unit is processing 1000kg Litopenaeus vannamei. The survival rate of Litopenaeus vannamei in the breeding process was calculated as 70%, the size of the finished shrimp was 70 /kg, and the functional unit in the breeding stage was to raise 100,000 larvae of Litopenaeus vannamei. The reproductive stage is calculated according to the survival rate of 20%, and the functional unit is to reproduce 500,000 nodal larvae.
根据凡纳滨对虾养成和综合利用的实际情况，考虑与研究目的和功能单位直接相关的过程，不考虑工厂以外产生环境负荷的各个阶段；数 据采集为2011年年均数 据。功能单位为加工1000kg凡纳滨对虾。 养 殖过程中凡纳滨对虾的 成活率按70%计算，成 品虾规格按70头/kg，则养殖阶段的功能单位为养殖10万尾凡纳滨对虾虾苗。 繁殖阶段按照20%的成活率计算 ，则功能单位为繁殖50万尾无节幼体 。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The specific sampling time is not specified in the literature, and the data used are the annual average data of 2011
文献未说明具体采样时间，使用的数据为2011年的年均数据

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A company in Zhanjiang City, Guangdong Province, selected the shrimp seedling breeding base, shrimp seedling breeding base, and comprehensive processing and utilization factory
广东省湛江市的A企业，选择其中的对虾虾苗繁育基地、虾苗养殖基地、综合加工利用工厂

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The technology of breeding and comprehensive processing and utilization of Litopenaeus vannamei, including the technology of breeding, breeding and processing of litopenaeus vannamei. The process of seed breeding includes shrimp breeding, mating, spawning, hatching, skimming, larva breeding and larva breeding. There should be facilities such as parent shrimp pond, seedling pond, reservoir, sedimentation tank, sand filter, and bait culture pond, equipped with facilities such as inlet and drainage, gas supply, power supply, heat supply and dehumidification, and quarantine and disinfection areas should be set up for workshop management and access. Feed fresh algae, silkworm, squid, squid, krill, etc. as feed. Monocystis culture is performed in accordance with DB33/T 2300. The area of the factory farming pond is from 30 m 2 to 100 m 2, the depth of the breeding pond is 1.5 m, and more than 2 reservoirs (or water treatment ponds) are equipped for alternate use, and the total water storage is required to reach more than 2 times the daily peak water exchange. Facilities such as tailwater treatment are built. It can also be equipped with online water quality monitoring, pressure sensing, automatic feeding, bottom oxygen or pure oxygen oxygen and other systems. Use the special compound feed for South American white shrimp, and the compound feed shall comply with the provisions of GB/T 22919.5.

凡纳滨对虾养殖和综合加工利用技术，具体包括对虾繁殖技术、养殖技术和加工技术。苗种繁育包括对虾种虾培育、交配、产卵、孵化、撇幼、幼体培育、仔虾培育至出池的过程。应建有亲虾池、育苗池、蓄水池、沉淀池、砂滤池、饵料培养池等设施，配备进排水、供气、供电、 供热和除湿等设施，车间管理进出宜设置防疫隔离消毒区域。投喂新鲜的藻类、沙蚕、鱿鱼、乌贼、磷虾等作为饲料。单胞藻培养按照DB33/T 2300的规定执行。 工厂化养殖 养殖池面积以30 m 2～100 m 2为宜，养殖池深度1.5 m，配备蓄水池（或水处理池）2 个以上，供交替 使用，要求总蓄水量达到日高峰换水量2倍以上。建有尾水处理等设施。另可配备在线水质监测、压力 感应、自动投饵、底增氧或纯氧增氧等系统。 使用南美白对虾专用配合饲料投喂，配合饲料应符合GB/T 22919.5的规定。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the cultivation and comprehensive utilization process for Litopenaeus vannamei (Pacific white shrimp), outlining its use in industrial shrimp farming and processing for food products. Intended applications for this dataset include the planning and optimization of shrimp aquaculture facilities, the development of efficient breeding practices, and the creation of processed shrimp products within the aquaculture industry. This information is highly relevant for aquaculture supply chain management, food processing companies, and sustainability assessments within the seafood industry.
本数据集描述凡纳滨对虾（太平洋白虾）的养殖和综合利用过程，概述了其在工业化虾类养殖和食品产品加工中的使用。数据集的应用目的包括规划和优化虾类养殖设施、发展高效繁育实践，以及在水产养殖行业内创建加工虾产品。该信息非常适用于水产养殖供应链管理、食品加工公司以及海产品行业内的可持续性评估。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: In this study, the equivalent factor method developed by ICI company in the UK is adopted to characterize the potential impacts of different load or emission factors on various forms of environmental problems, and quantify them into the same form or the same unit size. The "target distance" method is adopted, that is, the severity of an environmental effect is measured by the distance between the current level of the effect and the target level (standard or capacity) to indicate the relative contribution or weight of different types of environmental impact
本研究采用英国ICI公司开发的当量因子法进行特征化,将不同的负荷或排放因子在各形态环境问题中的潜在影响加以分析,并量化成相同的形态或是同单位的大小。采用“目标距离”法，即以当前影响水平与目标水平(标准或能力)之间的距离来衡量环境影响的严重程度，以表示不同类型环境影响的相对贡献或权重

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to the provisions and suggestions of ISO14042 international standard and GB24042-200 of our country, the impact assessment of shrimp aquaculture and comprehensive utilization system is divided into three steps: classification, specialization and quantification
本文依据ISO14042国际标准和我国国家标准GB24042-200的规定和建议，对虾养殖和综合利用系统的影响评价分为分类、特殊化和量化三个步骤

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data are from the annual average of site visits
数据来自实地调研的年平均值
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: According to the input list data of each stage of the whole life cycle of litopaeus vannawn cultivation and processing, the effect of mirage in each link was systematically calculated.Due to the large fluctuation of survival rate during shrimp culture, the literature calculated the survival rate of Litemonas vannamei in the culture process as 70%, and the standard size of finished shrimp was 70 head/kg, so the functional unit of the culture stage was to raise 100,000 tail of litemonas Vannamei shrimp seedlings. Based on the survival rate of 20%, the functional energy single position is the multiplication of 500 000 larvae without nodes.
文献根据凡纳滨对虾养成及加工全生命周期过程各个阶段的输入清单数据，系统计算了各环节幻境影响。由于对虾养殖过程中存活率波动较大，文献计算出凡纳滨对虾在养殖过程中的存活率为70%，且产虾标准尺寸为70头/kg，因此培养阶段的功能单位为培养10万尾凡纳滨对虾苗。以20%的成活率为基础，功能能单位是50万头无节幼虫的繁殖。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 易湘茜, 孙恢礼 & 潘剑宇. 凡纳滨对虾生命周期环境影响模型分析评价研究. 广西科学 21, 306–312 (2014).
易湘茜, 孙恢礼 & 潘剑宇. 凡纳滨对虾生命周期环境影响模型分析评价研究. 广西科学 21, 306–312 (2014).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The data were collected for the average year of 2011
数据采集为2011年年均数据
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, users must adhere to the following methodological guidelines: focus on processes directly related to the study's purpose and functional units, specifically excluding environmental loads from stages outside the factory. For accurate representation, users should account for the provided annual average data from 2011. The functional unit is defined as processing 1000kg of Litopenaeus vannamei, with survival rates of 70% during the breeding process and 20% during the reproductive stage. For modeling purposes, it is necessary to consider a functional unit of 100,000 larvae for the breeding stage and 500,000 nodal larvae for the reproductive stage. Extrapolation of this data for different years or other geographical locations should be done with caution, considering potential changes in technology, practice, and environmental conditions.

在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户必须遵循以下方法论指南：专注于与研究目的和功能单位直接相关的过程，特别是排除工厂外各阶段的环境负担。为了准确反映情况，用户应使用提供的2011年年度平均数据。功能单位定义为加工1000公斤凡纳滨对虾，养殖过程中的成活率为70%，繁殖阶段的成活率为20%。在建模过程中，需要考虑养殖阶段为10万尾凡纳滨对虾虾苗，繁殖阶段为50万尾无节幼体的功能单位。若对不同年份或其他地理位置的数据进行推算时，应谨慎考虑技术、实践和环境条件的潜在变化。

completeness.common:other: Input data include processes directly related to the purpose and functional units of the study, specifically energy, feed, equipment, infrastructure, pharmaceuticals and waste export processes at the stage of shrimp breeding, culture, product packaging and shrimp processing. The stages of the environmental load generated outside the plant are not considered.
输入数据包括与研究目的和功能单元直接相关的过程，具体包括对虾繁殖、养殖、产品包装和加工阶段的能源、饲料、设备、基础设施、药品和废物输出过程。不考虑厂外产生的环境负荷的阶段。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
